00039 bool TestSource::next(ByteString &key, ByteString &value) {
00040   String line;
00041   boost::shared_array<char> line_ptr;
00042   char *base, *ptr, *last;
00043   char *rowkey;
00044   char *column;
00045   char *value_str;
00046   int64_t timestamp;
00047   static char emptybuf[] = { 0 };
00048 
00049   while (getline(m_fin, line)) {
00050     m_cur_line++;
00051 
00052     boost::trim(line);
00053 
00054     line_ptr.reset(new char [strlen(line.c_str()) + 1]);
00055     base = line_ptr.get();
00056     strcpy(base, line.c_str());
00057 
00058     if ((ptr = strtok_r(base, "\t", &last)) == 0) {
00059       cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00060       continue;
00061     }
00062 
00063     if (!strcasecmp(ptr, "AUTO")) {
00064       timestamp = AUTO_ASSIGN;
00065     }
00066     else {
00067       timestamp = strtoll(ptr, 0, 0);
00068       if (timestamp == 0 && errno == EINVAL) {
00069         cerr << "Invalid timestamp (" << ptr << ") on line " << (m_cur_line-1)
00070              << endl;
00071         continue;
00072       }
00073       if (m_min_timestamp == 0 || timestamp < m_min_timestamp)
00074         m_min_timestamp = timestamp;
00075     }
00076 
00077     if ((rowkey = strtok_r(0, "\t", &last)) == 0) {
00078       cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00079       continue;
00080     }
00081 
00085     size_t row_key_len = strlen(rowkey);
00086     if (row_key_len >= 2) {
00087       if (!strcmp(&rowkey[row_key_len-2], "??")) {
00088         rowkey[row_key_len-1] = (char)0xff;
00089         rowkey[row_key_len-2] = (char)0xff;
00090       }
00091     }
00092 
00093     if ((column = strtok_r(0, "\t", &last)) == 0) {
00094       cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00095       continue;
00096     }
00097 
00098     if (!strcmp(column, "DELETE")) {
00099       if (!create_row_delete(rowkey, timestamp, key, value)) {
00100         cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00101         continue;
00102       }
00103       return true;
00104     }
00105 
00106     if ((value_str = strtok_r(0, "\t", &last)) == 0)
00107       value_str = emptybuf;
00108 
00109     if (!strcmp(value_str, "DELETE")) {
00110       if (!create_column_delete(rowkey, column, timestamp, key, value)) {
00111         cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00112         continue;
00113       }
00114       return true;
00115     }
00116 
00117     row_key_len = strlen(value_str);
00118     if (row_key_len >= 2) {
00119       if (!strcmp(&value_str[row_key_len-2], "??")) {
00120         value_str[row_key_len-1] = (char)0xff;
00121         value_str[row_key_len-2] = (char)0xff;
00122         cerr << "converting end of value (" << value_str << ")" << endl;
00123       }
00124     }
00125 
00126     if (!create_insert(rowkey, column, timestamp, value_str, key, value)) {
00127       cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00128       continue;
00129     }
00130 
00131     return true;
00132   }
00133 
00134   return false;
00135 }

00138 bool
00139 TestSource::create_row_delete(const char *row, int64_t timestamp,
00140                               ByteString &key, ByteString &value) {
00141   int32_t keylen = strlen(row) + 13;
00142   uint8_t control = 0;
00143 
00144   if (timestamp == AUTO_ASSIGN)
00145     control = Key::AUTO_TIMESTAMP;
00146   else if (timestamp)
00147     control = Key::HAVE_TIMESTAMP;
00148 
00149   m_key_buffer.clear();
00150   m_key_buffer.ensure(keylen+6);
00151 
00152   Serialization::encode_vi32(&m_key_buffer.ptr, keylen);
00153   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = control;
00154   m_key_buffer.add_unchecked(row, strlen(row)+1);
00155   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = 0;
00156   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = 0;
00157   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = FLAG_DELETE_ROW;
00158   Key::encode_ts64(&m_key_buffer.ptr, timestamp);
00159 
00160   key.ptr = m_key_buffer.base;
00161 
00162   m_value_buffer.clear();
00163   append_as_byte_string(m_value_buffer, 0, 0);
00164   value.ptr = m_value_buffer.base;
00165   return true;
00166 }

00169 bool
00170 TestSource::create_column_delete(const char *row, const char *column,
00171     int64_t timestamp, ByteString &key, ByteString &value) {
00172   int32_t keylen = 0;
00173   string cfstr;
00174   const char *qualifier = "";
00175   const char *ptr = strchr(column, ':');
00176   uint8_t control = 0;
00177   bool col_family_delete = false;
00178 
00179   if (timestamp == AUTO_ASSIGN)
00180     control = Key::AUTO_TIMESTAMP;
00181   else if (timestamp)
00182     control = Key::HAVE_TIMESTAMP;
00183 
00184   if (ptr == 0) { // column family delete
00185     col_family_delete = true;
00186     cfstr = string(column);
00187   }
00188   else {
00189     cfstr = string(column, ptr-column);
00190     qualifier = ptr+1;
00191   }
00192 
00193   Schema::ColumnFamily *cf = m_schema->get_column_family(cfstr);
00194   if (cf == 0) {
00195     cerr << "Column family '" << cfstr << "' not found in schema" << endl;
00196     return false;
00197   }
00198 
00199   if(col_family_delete) {
00200     m_key_buffer.clear();
00201     keylen = strlen(row) + 13;
00202     m_key_buffer.ensure(keylen+6);
00203 
00204     Serialization::encode_vi32(&m_key_buffer.ptr, keylen);
00205     *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = control;
00206     m_key_buffer.add_unchecked(row, strlen(row)+1);
00207     *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = cf->id;
00208     *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = 0;
00209     *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = FLAG_DELETE_COLUMN_FAMILY;
00210     Key::encode_ts64(&m_key_buffer.ptr, timestamp);
00211 
00212     key.ptr = m_key_buffer.base;
00213 
00214     m_value_buffer.clear();
00215     append_as_byte_string(m_value_buffer, 0, 0);
00216     value.ptr = m_value_buffer.base;
00217   }
00218   else {
00219     m_key_buffer.clear();
00220     keylen = strlen(row) + strlen(qualifier) + 13;
00221     m_key_buffer.ensure(keylen+6);
00222 
00223     Serialization::encode_vi32(&m_key_buffer.ptr, keylen);
00224     *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = control;
00225     m_key_buffer.add_unchecked(row, strlen(row)+1);
00226     *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = cf->id;
00227     m_key_buffer.add_unchecked(qualifier, strlen(qualifier)+1);
00228     *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = FLAG_DELETE_CELL;
00229     Key::encode_ts64(&m_key_buffer.ptr, timestamp);
00230 
00231     key.ptr = m_key_buffer.base;
00232 
00233     m_value_buffer.clear();
00234     append_as_byte_string(m_value_buffer, 0, 0);
00235     value.ptr = m_value_buffer.base;
00236   }
00237 
00238   return true;
00239 }

00242 bool
00243 TestSource::create_insert(const char *row, const char *column,
00244     int64_t timestamp, const char *value_str, ByteString &key,
00245     ByteString &value) {
00246   int32_t keylen = 0;
00247   string cfstr;
00248   const char *qualifier;
00249   const char *ptr = strchr(column, ':');
00250   uint8_t control = 0;
00251 
00252   if (timestamp == AUTO_ASSIGN)
00253     control = Key::AUTO_TIMESTAMP;
00254   else if (timestamp)
00255     control = Key::HAVE_TIMESTAMP;
00256 
00257   if (ptr == 0) {
00258     cerr << "Bad column family specifier (no family)" << endl;
00259     return false;
00260   }
00261 
00262   cfstr = string(column, ptr-column);
00263   qualifier = ptr+1;
00264 
00265   Schema::ColumnFamily *cf = m_schema->get_column_family(cfstr);
00266   if (cf == 0) {
00267     cerr << "Column family '" << cfstr << "' not found in schema" << endl;
00268     return false;
00269   }
00270 
00271   m_key_buffer.clear();
00272   keylen = strlen(row) + strlen(qualifier) + 13;
00273   m_key_buffer.ensure(keylen+6);
00274 
00275   Serialization::encode_vi32(&m_key_buffer.ptr, keylen);
00276   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = control;
00277   m_key_buffer.add_unchecked(row, strlen(row)+1);
00278   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = cf->id;
00279   m_key_buffer.add_unchecked(qualifier, strlen(qualifier)+1);
00280   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = FLAG_INSERT;
00281   Key::encode_ts64(&m_key_buffer.ptr, timestamp);
00282 
00283   key.ptr = m_key_buffer.base;
00284 
00285   m_value_buffer.clear();
00286   append_as_byte_string(m_value_buffer, value_str, strlen(value_str));
00287   value.ptr = m_value_buffer.base;
00288   return true;
00289 }
